page.title: 14Police Headquarters (2)
page.content: The Headquarters controls the whole of North Yorkshire.The County is divided into four divisions,Richmond,Harrogate,York and Malton. We saw the recording studio and were filmed asking questions.At first we couldn't think of anything to say.It was very hot because of the studio lights and we felt shy.We saw ourselves on film and also saw film about the North Yorkshire Police and their work. There is a Fingerprint Department and a Photographic Studio but most of the rooms are used as offices.The police use a lot of computers,these cut out paperwork.When a policeman sees something wrong,he radios to the man on the computer and he puts the information on the computer.
